attributes.action: Give the British public a referendum on whether any vaccine should be mandated
attributes.background:
Give the british people a chance to vote whether they agree if vaccine mandates should be mandated. 
Allow an open and honest on what would be the benifits when the UK already has one the highest vaccines rates in the world

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure if you want a referendum on requiring people to be vaccinated, or on vaccinations being a requirement for specific jobs. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. If you'd like an end to vaccine requirements for specific jobs, you might like to sign this petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599841
